import React from 'react'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCoffee } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faencilAlt } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import './dashboard.sass'; const Dashboard = ({ books, confirmDelete }) => { const { push } = useHistory(); return ( {books.map((item) => { return ( ) })}
Title Author Category ISBN Actions
Title:{item.title} Author:{item.author} Category:{item.category} ISBN:{item.isbn}
) } export default Dashboard
